comment: Want to help elect Pete Buttigieg but don't know where to start ? Here are five things you can do today to have a profound impact .
amr:
# ::snt Want to help elect Pete Buttigieg but don't know where to start ? Here are five things you can do today to have a profound impact .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (w / want-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (h / help-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (e / elect-01
                              :ARG0 y
                              :ARG1 (p / person
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Pete"
                                          :op2 "Buttigieg")))))
            :ARG2 (k / know-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG2-of (s / start-01
                              :ARG0 y))))
      :snt2 (p2 / possible-01
            :ARG1 (d / do-02
                  :ARG0 (y2 / you)
                  :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                        :quant 5)
                  :time (t3 / today)
                  :purpose (ii / impact-01
                        :mod (p3 / profound)))))

comment: . Share Pete for America social media content , especially for your state and local region .
amr:
# ::snt . Share Pete for America social media content , especially for your state and local region .
(s / share-01
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (c / content
            :source (m / media
                  :mod (s2 / social))
            :beneficiary (a / and
                  :op1 (s3 / state
                        :poss y)
                  :op2 (r / region
                        :ARG1-of (l / local-02)
                        :poss y))
            :mod (e / especially))
      :ARG2 (c2 / country
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "America")))

comment: Here in North Carolina we have a fantastic state group made up of five incredible local areas , each working across a great expansive region to host Pete-Ups , phone / text banks , postcard parties , canvasses , and much more .
amr:
# ::snt Here in North Carolina we have a fantastic state group made up of five incredible local areas , each working across a great expansive region to host Pete-Ups , phone / text banks , postcard parties , canvasses , and much more .
(h / have-03
      :ARG0 (w / we)
      :ARG1 (g / group
            :mod (s / state)
            :ARG1-of (f / fantastic-02)
            :ARG1-of (m / make-up-07
                  :ARG2 (a / area
                        :quant 5
                        :ARG1-of (l / local-02)
                        :mod (ii / incredible)
                        :ARG0-of (w2 / work-01
                              :ARG1 (h2 / host-01
                                    :ARG0 g
                                    :ARG1 (a2 / and
                                          :op1 (p / person
                                                :name (n / name
                                                      :op1 "Pete-Ups"))
                                          :op2 (b / bank
                                                :mod (p2 / phone-01)
                                                :mod (t / text-01))
                                          :op3 (p3 / party
                                                :mod (p4 / postcard))
                                          :op4 (c / canvass)
                                          :op5 (m2 / more
                                                :quant (m3 / much)))
                                    :location (r / region
                                          :ARG1-of (e / expand-01
                                                :mod (g2 / great))))
                              :mod (e2 / each))))
            :location (h3 / here
                  :location (s2 / state
                        :name n
                        :op1 "North"
                        :op2 "Carolina"))))

comment: . Search on <URL> for upcomings events in your area . There will likely be an event in or around your area . Unable to drive there ? Click on " Remote Only " events and you can find virtual trainings to give you access to activist steps you can take from home .
amr:
# ::snt . Search on <URL> for upcomings events in your area . There will likely be an event in or around your area . Unable to drive there ? Click on " Remote Only " events and you can find virtual trainings to give you access to activist steps you can take from home .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / search-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (u / url)
            :ARG2 (e / event
                  :mod (u2 / upcoming)
                  :location (a / area
                        :poss y)))
      :snt2 (l / likely-01
            :ARG1 (e2 / event
                  :location (o / or
                        :op1 (a2 / area
                              :poss y)
                        :op2 (a3 / around
                              :op1 a2))))
      :snt3 (p / possible-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (d / drive-01
                  :ARG0 (y2 / you)
                  :ARG1 (t / there))
            :polarity (a4 / amr-unknown))
      :snt4 (a5 / and
            :op1 (c / click-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y3 / you)
                  :ARG1 (e3 / event
                        :mod (r / remote
                              :mod (o2 / only))))
            :op2 (p2 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (f / find-01
                        :ARG0 y3
                        :ARG1 (t2 / train-01
                              :mod (v / virtual)
                              :ARG0-of (g / give-01
                                    :ARG1 (a6 / access-01
                                          :ARG0 y3
                                          :ARG1 (s2 / step-01
                                                :ARG0 (a7 / activist)
                                                :ARG1-of (t3 / take-01
                                                      :ARG0 y3
                                                      :source (h / home)
                                                      :ARG1-of (p3 / possible-01))))))))))

comment: . Sign up to text bank through the Iowa branch of the campaign . On a weekly basis , the Iowa branch of the campaign onboards at least one hundred and twenty new activists to make personalized text messages to folks in Iowa , and later on , in your own community .
amr:
# ::snt . Sign up to text bank through the Iowa branch of the campaign . On a weekly basis , the Iowa branch of the campaign onboards at least one hundred and twenty new activists to make personalized text messages to folks in Iowa , and later on , in your own community .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / sign-up-03
            :ARG1 (y / you)
            :ARG3 (b / bank-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG2 (t / text-01))
            :instrument (b2 / branch
                  :part-of (c / campaign-01)
                  :location (s2 / state
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Iowa"))))
      :snt2 (b3 / board-01
            :ARG0 (b4 / branch
                  :part-of (c2 / campaign-01)
                  :location s2)
            :ARG1 (a / activist
                  :ARG1-of (n2 / new-01)
                  :quant (a2 / at-least
                        :op1 100))
            :purpose (m2 / make-01
                  :ARG0 a
                  :ARG1 (m3 / message-01
                        :ARG0 a
                        :ARG1 (t2 / text-01)
                        :ARG2 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (f / folk
                                    :location s2)
                              :op2 (f2 / folk
                                    :location (c3 / community
                                          :poss (y2 / you))
                                    :time (a4 / after
                                          :op1 b)))
                        :ARG1-of (p / personal-02)))
            :frequency (r / rate-entity-91
                  :ARG3 (t3 / temporal-quantity
                        :quant 1
                        :unit (w / week)))))

comment: . Write a postcard for Pete . In North Carolina , you can find some premade postcards through your local group and a list of places to send it . But there's no reason you couldn't use postcards of your own community and begin writing to folks in Iowa , New Hampshire , or your area .

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (w / write-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (p / postcard
                  :beneficiary (p2 / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Pete"))))

                  :path (a / and
                        :op1 (g / group
                              :ARG1-of (l / local-02
                                    :ARG2 y2))
                        :op2 (l2 / list
                              :consist-of (p6 / place
                                    :location-of (s2 / send-01
                                          :ARG0 y2
                                          :ARG1 p4)))))
            :location (s3 / state
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "North"
                        :op2 "Carolina")))
      :snt3 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (r / reason
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0-of (c2 / cause-01
                        :ARG1 (p7 / possible-01
                              :polarity -
                              :ARG1 (a2 / and
                                    :op1 (u / use-01
                                          :ARG0 (y3 / you)
                                          :ARG1 (p8 / postcard
                                                :poss (c3 / community
                                                      :poss y3)))
                                    :op2 (b / begin-01
                                          :ARG0 y3
                                          :ARG1 (w2 / write-01
                                                :ARG0 y3
                                                :ARG2 (f2 / folk
                                                      :location (o / or

                                                                        :op1 "Iowa"))
                                                            :op2 (s5 / state
                                                                  :name (n4 / name
